allow: Bash(git -C "C:\\Projects\\mjcrockett.github.io" add app/shared/contexts/volume-context.tsx app/shared/components/providers.tsx app/shared/components/volume-iframe.tsx app/layout.tsx app/shared/components/navbar.tsx app/shared/components/navbar.module.css app/shared/contexts/audio-context.tsx app/avatar/initializer.tsx app/break/page.tsx app/avatarShop/page.tsx)

Bash(git -C "C:\\Projects\\mjcrockett.github.io" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add global volume slider to navbar with postMessage support for iframes

Volume context with localStorage persistence controls all audio site-wide.
Navbar slider adjusts thoughts audio at full volume and background music at
half volume. Iframe pages use postMessage to relay volume to child pages.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Projects\\standby" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add postMessage listener for parent-controlled volume

Listens for volume-change messages from the parent page and applies
the volume to all audio elements.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
